title: List of applications
add-license: Add one or several licenses to the application
add-license-signal: Use an existing signal on this application
help-invite: You can invite other users to an application. Once their account is created, they will be able to manage for you the contents (notifications) associated with this application.
can-modify-app: The guest can modify the application
can-manage-content: The guest can manage the content associated with the application
can-buy-licenses: The guest can buy or renew licenses
confirm-delete-invitation: You are going to delete an invitation
you-confirm-invitation: The guest will no longuer have access to your application unless you invite him again
you-confirm-application:
Removing the application will also remove

* attached invitations,
* attached licenses,
* attached notifications

⚠️ THE DELETION IS IRREVERSIBLE ⚠️
you-are-invited: You have been invited on the following application
need-account: But you must create an account to accept it
invalid-token: This invitation is not or no more active
